name: Old leather work gloves
data: It increases the users strength impressively.
It increases the users dexterity pathetically.
It decreases the users wisdom a bit.
It decreases the users intelligence a bit.
It has magnificent armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It decreases the users spellpoint regeneration poorly.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration a tiny bit.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It decreases the users fire resistance strongly.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'strike'.
